text:
Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman and more star in Mean Tweets: #Oscars edition. pic.twitter.com/5NHHvxuT3D 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Did you really think that Jimmy Kimmel would get through his Oscars-hosting gig without doing an extra star-studded edition of celebrities reading mean tweets? Of course not! Since nobody is safe from the wrath of Jimmy Kimmel’s infamous Mean Tweets, not even Academy Award nominees, please enjoy watching Casey Affleck read what most definitely is not the meanest tweet that has ever been written about him.
